group_1.textLeft: It looks like Sango has finished collecting@their tax…

group_1.textRight: Some people were able to escape, but it looks@like they stopped almost everyone else.
Still, it seems the collection wasn't enough.@Lord Sango must draw from his private funds…

group_1.textLeft: No matter how much violence is inflicted,@people can't give what they don't have.
Lord Sango has made a grave mistake…

group_1.textRight: I imagine the Mizuna Clan will be better@appreciated now.

group_1.textLeft: It's not something to be happy about.@Don't say anything like that again.

group_1.textRight: My apologies…
Erm, Father…
Did Lord Sango inform you of any@interference…?

group_1.textLeft: No, he did not.

group_1.textRight: [chara:104501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textLeft: Do you know something?

group_1.textRight: N-no…
I heard terrible things about that situation,@so I was curious if anyone dissented…

group_1.textLeft: Even if someone had, it wouldn't have been@anything worth discussing.
Like mere gnats that buzz about in the day@and leap into fires at night…
You look like someone dumped cold water@on your hearth.

group_1.textRight: Yes, it does feel that way…
At least Iroha's concept is still coming@back together.
I wonder how Tsuyu and Chizuru are supposed@to become friends at this rate, though…
Considering you played Chizuru in that@production, maybe you have an idea…?

group_1.textLeft: Just because I played her doesn't mean@I know the whole history!
I mean, it's been five hundred years!@The two Chizurus are totally different people!

group_1.textRight: Right… I shouldn't have asked…

group_1.textLeft: No, I shouldn't have shouted at you like that.@I'm just worried…

group_1.textRight: The clock is ticking…

group_1.textLeft: But if the Soul Vessel is still gathering@Iroha's concept,
then things are still going according to Iroha's@record, right…?

group_1.textRight: Correct.
If a crisis erupts, I'll inform you immediately.
Besides, Big Sister hasn't traveled through@many eras yet.
It's possible our understanding of things@will change in the not-too-distant future.
As far as I can tell from her records, however,@Tsuyu and Chizuru eventually join hands.

group_1.narration: ―Sana―@This magpie is supposed to help@bridge them together…
―Tsuruno―@C'mon, little magpie!@I'm begging you, please help them connect!
―Tsuruno―@This needs to happen@to keep the future on track!

group_1.textRight: I haven't seen the magpie fly all that much,@come to think of it.
Maybe it's not feeling very well…

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, you're right! Maybe we gotta help@boost its strength!
Here you go, little magpie!@There's plenty of food for you!

group_1.textRight: I wonder what their preferred diets are like…

group_1.textLeft: Hmm… In our era, we could just look it up@on our phones, but…

group_1.textRight: What are you two doing?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Gah!
[chara:100301:effect_shake]Ugh… Yeowch.

group_1.textRight: Goodness…is everything alright?@You were both fiddling with the cage…

group_1.textLeft: Well, you see…
We were trying to feed the magpie@to keep it healthy.

group_1.textRight: What? Is it not feeling well…?!

group_1.textLeft: Well, it's more like, we were trying@to help perk it up…
I mean, take a look at the magpie…

group_1.textCenter: [bgEffect:shakeSmall]Look up there! The sky! It's flying away!

group_1.textRight: Don't just stand there!
Didn't I explain when you first arrived?!

group_1.textLeft: …Yeah.

group_1.textRight: It was a gift from my father, a gift from@beyond this country!

group_1.textLeft: Right…

group_1.textRight: Unbelievable…! Tsuruno Yui!@Get out of my sight!
[chara:104501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]*Gasp*
I-I'm sorry…I shouldn't have said that…!

group_1.textLeft: No, this is all my fault… You and the magpie@didn't do anything wrong…

group_1.textRight: Everything's alright!@We just had a bit of a commotion!
They know you were the one responsible for@the bird's escape because of how I screamed…
If Father finds out, there will be nothing@I can do to stop him.

group_1.textLeft: What should we do…?

group_1.textRight: I'll show you a secret passage. You can escape@to Suitoku Temple and take shelter there…
Out of the frying pan, into the fire.

group_1.textLeft: The magpie that brings together Tsuyu@and Chizuru…it got away…

group_1.textRight: Wh-what do we do now…?
I should never have fed it…

group_1.textLeft: This has really crushed my spirits…@I'm so sorry, guys…
